description: (WARNING: likely to be blocked) Log in to a Gmail account and send a test email
objective: Open a browser and navigate to mail.google.com. Google will almost certainly block the automated context, so use the 'wait_for_human' tool to perform the entire signâ€‘in in a separate real browser window. Once authenticated manually, switch back to the VIO browser and have it compose an email to yourself with subject "VIO Test" and body "This is a hard task." then send and declare success. Note: even after manual login the agent may see the "not secure" warning because the page still detects automation. This scenario is included for experimentation only; for reliable email automation use Google's APIs instead.

description: Navigate through a multi-page form and submit data
objective: Open a browser, go to https://www.w3schools.com/html/html_forms.asp, fill out the sample form fields with arbitrary values, submit the form, and declare success once a result page appears.
